metadata.name: Execute MSDT Via Answer File
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "msdt.exe" using an answer file which is simulating the legitimate way of calling msdt via "pcwrun.exe" (For example from the compatibility tab)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\msdt.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\windows\\\\diagnostics\\\\index\\\\pcwdiagnostic.xml')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -af ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /af '))) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\pcwrun.exe')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "msdt.exe" using an answer file which is simulating the legitimate way of calling msdt via "pcwrun.exe" (For example from the compatibility tab)

metadata.objective: False positive: Possible undocumented parents of "msdt" other than "pcwrun" Reference: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Msdt/
